person.persName: Addison H. Pierce (Lyon County, KY, farm laborer and soldier)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Ohio native. Son of Samuel Pierce and Elizabeth Pierce. Married to Serela Barrett in Lyon County, Kentucky, on December 16, 1863. Farm laborer in Lyon County in 1860. Served in the 15th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from August 14, 1862, to October 29, 1863.
